title: IOPB Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Research Associate Posts
description: The Institute of Physics, Bhubaneswar, has the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Research Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation, Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the IOPB Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the last date of application. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. If you are loo...
